data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Fang, Feng, Ji-Nian (2012): A review of the genus Megapulvinaria Young (Hemiptera, Coccoidea, Coccidae) from China, with a description of a new species. ZooKeys 228: 59-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.228.3211, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.228.3211
